body_html:
Would doing it like

indices = torch.LongTensor(range(grad_output.size(dim)-1,-1,-1))
grad_input = torch.index_select(grad_output, dim, indices)
grad_input = torch.cumsum(grad_input, dim)

be faster?
body_text:
Would doing it like
indices = torch.LongTensor(range(grad_output.size(dim)-1,-1,-1))
grad_input = torch.index_select(grad_output, dim, indices)
grad_input = torch.cumsum(grad_input, dim)

be faster?
body:
Would doing it like 
```
indices = torch.LongTensor(range(grad_output.size(dim)-1,-1,-1))
grad_input = torch.index_select(grad_output, dim, indices)
grad_input = torch.cumsum(grad_input, dim)
```
be faster?
